body_html:
Thanks for your reply. @apaszke
I checked the user path and the root path.
And I found nothing suspect. Actually, I have picked out some path before.
This is my user path:

/data1/public/research_venv/anaconda3/bin:/usr/local/mpi/bin:/usr/local/cuda-8.0/:
/usr/local/cuda-8.0/bin:/usr/local/cuda-8.0/lib64:/usr/local/hadoop/bin/:/usr/local/sbin:
/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin:/usr/games:/usr/local/games:
/home/node/torch/install/lib:/home/node/torch/install/bin:/home/node/bin

Any suggestions?

body:
Thanks for your reply. @apaszke 
I checked the user path and the root path.
And I found nothing suspect. Actually, I have picked out some path before.
This is my user` path`:
```
/data1/public/research_venv/anaconda3/bin:/usr/local/mpi/bin:/usr/local/cuda-8.0/:
/usr/local/cuda-8.0/bin:/usr/local/cuda-8.0/lib64:/usr/local/hadoop/bin/:/usr/local/sbin:
/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin:/usr/games:/usr/local/games:
/home/node/torch/install/lib:/home/node/torch/install/bin:/home/node/bin
```
Any suggestions?
